title: Tomato, salami and mozzarella tart
ingredients: ['190g chilled ready rolled puff pastry', '1/2 tablespoon tomato puree', '80g grated mozzarella cheese', '4 to 6 slices salami, chopped into large chunks', 'herbes de provence or mixed herbs, to taste', '1/2 vine ripened tomato, sliced (see note below)', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1/4 onion, sliced', '1 beaten egg or milk for glaze', 'olive oil for serving (optional)']
